variant.p: An entity shall recognise the components of defined benefit cost, except to the extent that another IFRS requires or permits their inclusion in the cost of an asset, as follows:

li.p: service cost (see paragraphs 66–112 and paragraph 122A) in profit or loss;
net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset) (see paragraphs 123–126) in profit or loss; and
remeasurements of the net defined benefit liability (asset) (see paragraphs 127–130) in other comprehensive income.
